string-array.name: protocols
string-array.item: ECHO
FTP
GHOST
HTTP
HTTPS
MySQL
SIP

string-array.name: protocols_description
string-array.item: A service for testing and measurement of round-trip times in IP networks
A protocol used to transfer files from one host to another host
A protocol mirrors an incoming connection back to the attacker on the same port, that it is running on
A protocol to exchange or transfer hypertext. It is the foundation of data communication for the World Wide Web
The same as HTTP, but using a secure connections based on SSL/TLS
The world\'s second most widely used relational database management system
A protocol for VoIP (Voice over IP) services
A protocol used for providing shared access to files, printers, serial ports, and miscellaneous communications between nodes on a network
A network protocol that provides file access, file transfer, and file management functionalities over any reliable data stream
A network protocol used on the Internet or local area networks to provide a bidirectional interactive text-oriented communication facility using a virtual terminal connection
